summary: UI Style Module with Public/Admin separation and Forms Manager with Order Form seeding - All backend (12/12) and frontend (10/10) tests passed.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/auth-v2/login with admin@libreria.com/admin returns 200 with token
Backend: POST /api/auth-v2/login with invalid credentials returns 401/403
Backend: GET /api/public/ui-style returns both 'public' and 'admin' style objects
Backend: GET /api/admin/ui-style (authed) returns style with public/admin sub-objects
Backend: GET /api/admin/ui-style returns available_templates (5: default, elegant, warm, ocean, minimal)
Backend: GET /api/admin/ui-style returns available_fonts (12 fonts including Inter, Poppins, DM Sans, etc)
Backend: GET /api/admin/ui-style returns density_options (compact, comfortable, spacious)
Backend: PUT /api/admin/ui-style saves updated style with public+admin separation
Backend: GET /api/store/form-config/admin/form-types/list returns 3 form types
Backend: Order Form has 4 seeded fields (payment_method, payment_reference, payment_receipt, notes)
Backend: Order Form fields have multilingual labels (EN/ES/ZH)
Backend: Admin style has density setting (default compact)
Frontend: Admin login works at /admin/login
Frontend: Administration > Forms tab shows Forms Manager with 3 form types
Frontend: Student Linking Form shows 7 fields badge
Frontend: Textbook Access Request shows 6 fields badge
Frontend: Order Form shows 4 fields badge
Frontend: Order Form field editor shows all 4 fields with correct types
Frontend: UI Style tab shows separate Public Site and Admin Panel tabs
Frontend: UI Style shows Color Theme (5 templates), Font (12 options), Density (3 options), Radius, Cards dropdowns
Frontend: Admin Panel tab shows Minimal template selected with Compact density
Frontend: Live Preview section shows Button, Card, Badge samples
critical_code_review_comments: UIStyleModule.jsx correctly implements Public/Admin tab separation with StyleEditor component
ui_style_service.py properly returns both public and admin styles in get_public_style()
form_config_repository.py seed_default_fields() correctly seeds 4 order_form fields
FORM_TYPE_REGISTRY includes all 3 form types with proper metadata
ThemeContext.js scope support enables admin/public style switching on AdminDashboard mount/unmount
DENSITY_VARS in uiStylePresets.js provides compact/comfortable/spacious CSS variable sets
applyUIStyle() correctly applies density, font, radius, card_style CSS variables
seed_data_creation: 4 default order_form fields seeded automatically via seed_default_fields(): payment_method (select), payment_reference (text), payment_receipt (file), notes (textarea)

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are live and functional

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI Style Module fully implemented with Public/Admin separation. Key endpoints: GET /api/public/ui-style (returns public+admin), GET/PUT /api/admin/ui-style. Forms Manager has 3 form types: student_linking (7 fields), textbook_access (6 fields), order_form (4 fields). UI Style options: 5 templates, 12 fonts, 3 density options. Test file: /app/backend/tests/test_ui_style_forms_manager.py

ui_style_module.public_admin_tabs: Public Site and Admin Panel tabs with separate configurations
ui_style_module.fonts: 12 font families including Inter, Poppins, DM Sans, Nunito, Lora, etc
ui_style_module.preview: Live preview with Button, Card, Badge samples
